snippet: KROLL--Douglas. 7/7/67 - 4/8/02 We celebrated your life this year in a way you would have loved - all of your closest friends were there, and their children, on the beach sharing stories about you. The love lives on. Love - Lois & Pamela Kroll, family & friends 1/3
lead_paragraph: KROLL--Douglas. 7/7/67 - 4/8/02 We celebrated your life this year in a way you would have loved - all of your closest friends were there, and their children, on the beach sharing stories about you. The love lives on. Love - Lois & Pamela Kroll, family & friends 1/3
